definition: tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
to pour beans out of a bamboo tube/to come clean/to make a clean breast of things

sentences.english: Bamboo tubes are used as hookah.
The bamboo rice and the Shanlan wine are the special food of Li nationality.
sentences.chinese: 竹筒钣和山兰酒是黎族的特色食蕊。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Zhuang medicine Bazhuguan for arthralgia-syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察壮医药物竹筒拔罐治疗痹病的疗效。

sentences.english: Sheng is a mouth-blown free reed instrument consisting essentially of vertical bamboo pipes.
sentences.chinese: 笙是一种簧管类乐器，由一定数目的竹筒及簧片组成。

sentences.english: In this front courtyard left side, you may free receive the bamboo tube to carry on ask the bamboo slip.
sentences.chinese: 在这个前院的左侧，没关系收费支付竹筒举办求签。

sentences.english: But he had a bad voice just like a dried-up bamboo tube.
sentences.chinese: 可是，他的嗓子太差，象干裂竹筒。

sentences.english: I have to recommend the traditional food " Bamboo rice ".
sentences.chinese: 我要推荐的就是“竹筒饭”。

sentences.english: Install meters with bamboo baked, called "sealed canister."
sentences.chinese: 用竹筒装米密封烤熟，称“筒粽”。

sentences.english: Fill chicken broth to 3/4 full, cover and double-boil for 45 minutes until cooked.
sentences.chinese: 注入适量清鸡汤盖面，盖好竹筒，炖45分钟至熟透。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
to seal jars etc with mud, clay or lute/lute/luting
leaf (usually bamboo or reed leaf) used to wrap 粽子[zong4 zi5] sticky rice dumplings
